p: R e showed values higher than 1 during 2013 and 2014 (1.23–1.17), declined in 2015 and then increased steeply in early 2016, reaching a peak value of 1.73 in mid-2016 (95% HPD: 1.03–2.37). After the 2016 peak, R e declined to reach a plateau of 1 around early 2017, which was maintained up to mid-2018.
